name: 高級寫作（二）
restrict: ◎限大三修習◎必須先修過【ENU0287  中級寫作（一）】、【ENU0288  中級寫作（二）】、【ENU0289  高級寫作（一）】
description: 在「高級寫作」中，該課程旨在將學生在前兩年學到的寫作技巧，與他們對某個主題、學科或主題的知識相結合，以便為學生未來的職業生涯做好準備。本課程將使用不同類型、富有創意的文體，在不同領域進行情境化的寫作，內容可能包括與考試相關、與工作相關、或與研究論文相關的主題。以文字為主的寫作，也可能搭配其他的傳播管道，例如圖片、音頻、或個人/小組網頁等來進行。
goals: To help students rehearse skills in various modes of writing
Help students build a good sense of the difference between smart, sophisticated, quality writing and bland, hackneyed writing
Students are expected to integrate writing techniques with their knowledge of the topic/subject
syllabus:
**Course description**
----------------------

### This course is to help students develop their knowledge of particular writing genres and apply it to real-world situations. They will be particularly oriented to writing genres related to academic writing and short story writing. In addition, they will learn to develop writing techniques regarding maintaining parallel structures, establishing tone, and using diction. It is intended that they can apply what they learn to writing assignments by writing a particular essay, reviewing their peers’ essays, and making major revisions as suggested.

*   ### Essay draft                                                   45%
